job_description:
Company Description Innovest Capital is a leading real estate investment consultancy firm specializing in premium property opportunities in the United Arab Emirates and the United Kingdom. Headquartered in London with a robust presence in Dubai, the company connects high-net-worth individuals and global investors to exclusive property developments in dynamic markets. Innovest Capital provides comprehensive advisory services and deep market insights, helping clients build prosperous real estate portfolios through secure and future-ready investments. The firm collaborates with renowned developers such as Emaar, Nakheel, Berkeley Group, and Barratt London, giving clients direct access to carefully curated residential and income-generating opportunities. Role Description This is a full-time on-site role based in the London Area, United Kingdom, for an Internship Trainee at Innovest Capital. The Trainee will work closely with the team on various tasks, including maintaining client databases, conducting market research, preparing property report presentations, and assisting in identifying potential investment opportunities for clients. They will also support the development of marketing materials, attend strategy meetings, and participate in client interactions to gain valuable industry experience and exposure. Qualifications Strong analytical and research skills with attention to detail and the ability to synthesize data effectively.Good communication and interpersonal skills for assisting with client interactions and team collaboration.Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word) and other relevant software for creating presentations and maintaining databases.A basic understanding of the real estate investment market and an eagerness to learn more about property investments.Self-motivated, proactive, and strong organizational skills to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, Real Estate, or a related field is preferred.Knowledge of the real estate markets in the UAE and the UK is a plus.



        
            Show more
          

          



        
            Show less

key_requirements: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)
Assist in identifying potential investment opportunities
Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, Real Estate, or a related field
job_analysis.selected_projects_reasoning:
The 'Internship Trainee' role at Innovest Capital emphasizes analytical skills, market research, data synthesis, database management, and report preparation. While the candidate is pursuing an AI degree, the job does not explicitly require AI/ML development, but rather the underlying data-centric and analytical skills. 

1.  **DocuCare AI - AI-Powered Medical Document Management System**: This project was selected for its direct relevance to data synthesis, intelligent data extraction (OCR), and complex data querying using RAG. These capabilities are crucial for processing diverse information for market research or property reports, aligning with the need to 'synthesize data effectively' and manage data. It also showcases proficiency in modern software development ('other relevant software').
2.  **Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)**: This project directly addresses 'conducting market research' through its scraping pipelines and 'analytical skills' via the matching engine with weighted vectors. The robust PostgreSQL schema design is also highly relevant for 'maintaining client databases' efficiently and scalably. The use of Python, a strong analytical language, is also a significant plus.

tailored_cv.professional_summary: Highly analytical and proactive Master's student in Artificial Intelligence with a robust foundation in data analysis, database management, and process automation. Eager to apply strong research, data synthesis, and problem-solving skills to the real estate investment sector. Proven ability to translate complex data into actionable insights and streamline operations, with proficiency in advanced data tools and business intelligence platforms, including Microsoft Office Suite. Committed to supporting strategic initiatives and contributing to data-driven decision-making in a fast-paced environment.

experience.title: Salesforce Administrator Intern
achievements: Automated Salesforce workflows and validation rules, improving CRM accuracy by 20% and streamlining client data management.
Designed and implemented travel management modules with interactive dashboards for enhanced reporting and visibility, aiding data-driven decisions.
Collaborated cross-functionally to convert intricate business requirements into scalable configurations, ensuring robust database solutions.

experience.title: Technology Foundations Virtual Experience
achievements: Completed an end-to-end Agile SDLC simulation, gaining practical experience in project management and data integrity practices.
Debugged and optimised Python scripts, improving runtime efficiency by 30%, demonstrating strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Presented algorithmic solutions with clear flow diagrams, significantly improving technical communication and stakeholder understanding.

projects.title: DocuCare AI - AI-Powered Medical Document Management System
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered web application for intelligent medical document management, leveraging AI for OCR, data extraction, and summarized insights.
achievements: Engineered an AI pipeline using Google Gemini 1.5 Flash for advanced optical character recognition (OCR) and precise data extraction from unstructured documents, critical for data synthesis.
Implemented an intelligent Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chat system with vector embeddings for querying health records, demonstrating sophisticated data retrieval and analytical capabilities.
Re-architected backend infrastructure to a 100% free-tier compatible stack using Supabase, demonstrating cost-effective database management and system design.
Built a robust frontend with Next.js 14 App Router and Server Actions, ensuring secure data fetching and a seamless user experience for data interaction.

projects.title: Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)
projects.description: Created a comprehensive job aggregation and matching platform, automating local search and leveraging data for personalized recommendations.
achievements: Architected a specific matching engine utilizing weighted vectors to analyze and align user availability, location, and skills, demonstrating strong analytical and algorithmic design skills.
Engineered asynchronous background worker pipelines with Celery and Redis to efficiently scrape external job boards, ensuring comprehensive market research without performance degradation.
Designed a normalized PostgreSQL schema with SQLAlchemy ORM for robust and scalable management of complex relational data, essential for client databases.
Developed a high-performance reactive frontend using React 19, enabling intuitive user interaction with complex data insights.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence

other_degrees.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
